title: Typo trip in Germany?
content:
I am going to Germany this coming Sep. To be more exact, I am going to Berlin, Hanover and Munich. I am wondering if there are some places like museums for types and some good bookstore, etc.

Any idea?

 [‹ Karadzic Business Card](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122024847/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47693 "Go to previous forum topic") [Alfredo Heavy or Alexuss Heavy? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122024847/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47770 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mydot2001

comments.content:
If you happen to be in Munich, September, 19th, be sure to be present at the ’Typotag’ _(The Type Day)_, curated by the typographic society Munich.  
 _[www.typotag.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122024847/http:/www.typotag.de/)_

[typophile.com/node/19574](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122024847/http:/typophile.com/node/19574)  
 [typophile.com/node/35313](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122024847/http:/typophile.com/node/35313)  
 [typophile.com/node/34882](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122024847/http:/typophile.com/node/34882)

Dav

My plane leaves on Sep. 20th.

Thanks for the links. They are very helpful.
